wikipedia_page.main: Peter Vaughan,  (born 7 September 1962) is a Welsh public servant and retired police chief. He served as the Chief Constable of South Wales Police from January 2010 to December 2017 and is currently Lord Lieutenant of Mid Glamorgan.

response: She retired at the end of December 2009 as Britain's longest-serving female chief constablehttp://www.thisissouthwales.co.uk/news/Police-chief-Barbara-Wilding-leave-42-year-career/article-1655383-detail/article.html and was succeeded by Peter Vaughan. In 2011 she was appointed High Sheriff of Mid Glamorgan.

link_mentions.page: List of lord-lieutenants in the United Kingdom

response: Peter Vaughan (1923–2016) was a British character actor.
Peter Vaughan may also refer to:
* Peter Vaughan (bishop) (1930–2020), Bishop of Ramsbury in the Church of England
* Peter Vaughan (police officer) (born 1962), Chief Constable of South Wales Police
* Peter Vaughan – Chief Constable, South Wales Police
